Row.Text: Our Technologies
Default Tree
Technology Trees Available
[ICON_BULLET]Requires: {1_TechsString}
"Developing the plan is actually laying out the sequence of events that have to occur for you to achieve your goal." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- George L. Morrisey[/COLOR]
"Even if you are on the right track, you will get run over if you just sit there." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Will Rogers[/COLOR]
"Four steps to achievement: Plan purposefully. Prepare prayerfully. Proceed positively. Pursue persistently." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- William A. Ward[/COLOR]
"Take time to deliberate, but when the time for action has arrived, stop thinking and go in." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Napoleon Bonaparte[/COLOR]
"Take your life in your own hands and what happens? A terrible thing: no one to blame." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Erica Jong[/COLOR]
"The greatest mistake you can make in life is to be continually fearing you will make one." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Elbert Hubbard[/COLOR]
"The indispensable first step to getting the things you want out of life is this: decide what you want." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Ben Stein[/COLOR]
"The search for the perfect venture can turn into procrastination. Your idea may or may not have merit. The key is to get started." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Unknown Author[/COLOR]
"The wise man bridges the gap by laying out the path by means of which he can get from where he is to where he wants to go." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- John Pierpont Morgan[/COLOR]
"Plans are nothing; planning is everything." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Dwight D. Eisenhower[/COLOR]
"Please all, and you will please none." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Aesop[/COLOR]
"Stay committed to your decisions; but stay flexible in your approach." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Tony Robbins[/COLOR]
"Successful leaders have the courage to take action while others hesitate." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- John C. Maxwell[/COLOR]
"When someone asks you if you're a god, you say YES!" [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Winston Zeddemore[/COLOR]
"Pretend for a moment that I don't know anything about metallurgy, engineering, or physics, and just tell me what the hell is going on. " [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Dr. Peter Venkman[/COLOR]
"There is no spoon." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Spoon Boy[/COLOR]
"Do or do not, There is no try." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Yoda[/COLOR]
"We have no simple problems or easy decisions after kindergarten." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- John W. Turk[/COLOR]
"When you cannot make up your mind which of two evenly balanced courses of action you should take - choose the bolder." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- William Joseph Slim[/COLOR]
"If you chase two rabbits, both will escape." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Unknown Author[/COLOR]
"If you put off everything till you're sure of it, you'll get nothing done." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Norman Vincent Peale[/COLOR]
"It takes as much energy to wish as it does to plan." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Eleanor Roosevelt[/COLOR]
"It's in your moments of decision that your destiny is shaped." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Anthony Robbins[/COLOR]
"A plan is a list of actions arranged in whatever sequence is thought likely to achieve an objective." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- John Argenti[/COLOR]
"All you need is the plan, the road map, and the courage to press on to your destination." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Earl Nightingale[/COLOR]
"Always plan ahead. It wasn't raining when Noah built the ark." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Richard C. Cushing[/COLOR]
"By failing to prepare, you are preparing to fail." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Benjamin Franklin[/COLOR]
"Nothing is more difficult, and therefore more precious, than to be able to decide." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Napoleon Bonaparte[/COLOR]
"Houston, we have a problem." [NEWLINE]
"Sure I could've stayed. Could've even been king. But in my own way, I am king." [NEWLINE] [COLOR_GREEN]- Ash[/COLOR]
"Hail to the king, baby" [NEWLINE]
"When this baby hits eighty eight miles an hour, you're gonna see some serious shit." [NEWLINE]
"Our journey through time has taken a most excellent turn!" [NEWLINE]
"Hi, I'm Chucky. Wanna play?" [NEWLINE]
